docs.snippet: Rubin Carter led a fascinating life, one that can be used as a lesson to young athletes so consumed with attaining wealth and glory that they lose sight of forging an enduring legacy....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rubin Carter led a fascinating life, one that can be used as a lesson to young athletes so consumed with attaining wealth and glory that they lose sight of forging an enduring legacy.
docs.abstract: William C Rhoden Sports of The Times column remembers Rubin Carter, professional boxer who spent 19 years in prison before murder charges against him were dismissed on grounds of prosecutorial misconduct; recognizes Carter for contributions to society that will continue to resonate long after his passing.

headline.main: Carter Was a Fighter Who Stood His Ground
